sentences: SBSTA Chair Halldór Thorgeirsson (Iceland) opened the session, and delegates adopted the agenda (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/11).
On election of officers other than the Chair, Chair Thorgeirsson said this would be considered in conjunction with the election of COP-9 Bureau members.
enb_long_title: Ninth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
